response.overview: Set in ancient China, “The Demon Concubine Daji” follows the journey of a young man whose father was murdered when he was just a child. Years later, he crosses paths with a dying man who gives him a mission: deliver a piece of cloth to a general in exchange for a reward. Unknowingly, he becomes involved in a larger conspiracy to assassinate the powerful and malevolent concubine, Daji. As he navigates a dangerous world of intrigue, betrayal, and dark magic, he must decide whether to embrace his fate or fight to change it.
response.tagline: “A destiny bound by the dark power of Daji.”
response.title: The demon concubine: Daji
